destinations.text: Explore this hidden travel destination in Embu County
destinations.label: Camp Ndunda Falls

destinations.text: Hike across the famous Ngong Hills and get a chance to enjoy beautiful scenery
destinations.label: Ngong Hills

destinations.text: Experience a cool breeze and fresh air in the outskirts of Nairobi
destinations.label: The Karura Forest Reserve

destinations.text: Enjoy never-ending relaxation and cool climate in Karen, Nairobi County
destinations.label: Oloolua Nature Trail

destinations.text: Enjoy F1-esque racing around a real Go-kart track in your chase to get the quickest lap time among your peers
destinations.label: GP Karting Kenya

destinations.text: After a long day spent in the Nairobi CBD, go to this unique location and relax under the shade in a chilling breeze
destinations.label: Memorial Park Kenya
